location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident, dated 28 May 1818. It informs him that the Governor of Bombay approves of his decision to send Richard Sharp to Shiraz, in order to bear witness to the punishment of the men who insulted John Williams.
